title: /proc/kmsg works but dmesg does not
body:
root@localhost:/etc# dmesg
dmesg: klogctl failed: Invalid argument
root@localhost:/etc# cat /dev/kmsg
] ~W�Q<3>init: (1) ERROR: InitUpdateNetworkInformation:1546: Unexpected network information size 5
H ~W�Q<3>init: (1) ERROR: InitEntry:1403: InitUpdateNetworkInformation failed
^C
root@localhost:/etc#

comments.body: I plugged in my arduino board after installing the needed software through apt-get. I was expecting it to pop up in /dev/ttyACM but it never did. I tried checking dmesg and was greeted by
